name: Tony Birb Pro Sk8er 2003
description:
Tony Birb: Pro Sk8er 2003 is an infinite runner in which you play as the legendary Tony Birb, sliding down twigs. It was created for the EPX Game Jam Fall 2017.

Developers: Heather Kemp and Alic Szecsei.

Live Demo: hekemp.github.io/TonyBirb

How To Play: Jump up in the air and between the different twigs to avoid the gaps and score extra points for waiting until the last second to jump off of the twigs.

Inspiration: This game was inspired by a photo, .gif, and soundtrack of a bird sliding down a twig from Tumblr (BobaCupcake).
